description: Captain Mira Voss is a resolute space explorer known for her investigation of the silent colony of Elysia. Guided by the cryptic message 'Trust the stars,' she seeks to unravel the cosmic mystery behind the energy pulse that silenced the settlement. Mira embodies hope and steadfast curiosity amid vast cosmic enigmas.

locations.name: Elysia
locations.note: Site of mysterious energy pulse and abandonment.

attributes.background: Experienced captain with a strong commitment to uncovering truths hidden in silent colonies. Known for interpreting cryptic cosmic messages and enduring long vigils in isolation.

audio.title: Haunting Ballad of Captain Mira Voss and Elysia

images.title: Flickering Console with 'Trust the stars' Message

text.title: Log Entry: Discovery of the Blinking Console
text.content: Captain Mira Voss found a blinking console in the silent colony of Elysia bearing the enigmatic message 'Trust the stars'. Interpreting this as a cosmic invitation, she remains vigilant awaiting further clues about the colony's fate.
